io.github.robolib.util

Interface StaticTimeInterface


  • public interface StaticTimeInterface
    Author:
    noriah Reuland

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delay(double seconds)
      Pause the thread for a specified time.
      double getFPGATimestamp()
      Return the system clock time in seconds.
      double getMatchTime()
      Return the approximate match time The FMS does not currently send the official match time to the robots This returns the time since the enable signal sent from the Driver Station At the beginning of autonomous, the time is reset to 0.0 seconds At the beginning of teleop, the time is reset to +15.0 seconds If the robot is disabled, this returns 0.0 seconds Warning: This is not an official time (so it cannot be used to argue with referees)
      TimerInterface newTimer()
      Create a new Timer for use with the Timer

    • Method Detail

      • getFPGATimestamp

        double getFPGATimestamp()
        Return the system clock time in seconds. Return the time from the FPGA hardware clock in seconds since the FPGA started.
        Returns:
        Robot running time in seconds.

      • getMatchTime

        double getMatchTime()
        Return the approximate match time The FMS does not currently send the official match time to the robots This returns the time since the enable signal sent from the Driver Station At the beginning of autonomous, the time is reset to 0.0 seconds At the beginning of teleop, the time is reset to +15.0 seconds If the robot is disabled, this returns 0.0 seconds Warning: This is not an official time (so it cannot be used to argue with referees)
        Returns:
        Match time in seconds since the beginning of autonomous

      • delay

        void delay(double seconds)
        Pause the thread for a specified time. Pause the execution of the thread for a specified period of time given in seconds. Motors will continue to run at their last assigned values, and sensors will continue to update. Only the task containing the wait will pause until the wait time is expired.
        Parameters:
        seconds - Length of time to pause

      • newTimer

        TimerInterface newTimer()
        Create a new Timer for use with the Timer
        Returns:
        new TimerInterface timer
